game.name: The Hovaria
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ride the Hoverboard, Challenge gravity, and own the race. Hoverrun your friends in a neon-lit space station on your physics-driven hoverboard in this 1-4 player online racer. Don't fall off and don't get left behind as you race against your friends in a world of neon lights and deadly curves.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ride the Hoverboard, Challenge gravity, and own the race. Hoverrun your friends in a neon-lit space station on your physics-driven hoverboard in this 1-4 player online racer. Don't fall off and don't get left behind as you race against your friends in a world of neon lights and deadly curves.
